channel.title: Help me with smelting script im :confused:

item.title: Help me with smelting script im :confused:
item.dc:creator: @wouterscape wouterscape
item.description:
@wouterscape wrote:

mean this case
it says isiteminbag(438) == true { but i need so it need a tin ores as well

case 436: //copper ore if (IsItemInBag(438) == true) { smelting[0] = 1; smelting[1] = 1; if (misc.random(2) == 1) { smelting[2] = 6; } else { smelting[2] = 7; } smelting[3] = 2349; } else { sendMessage("You need 1 copper ore and 1 tin ore to smelt 1 bronze bar."); return false; } break;

Read full topic
